course.title: The Body in Art: From Ideal to Real
course.description: This course explores how artists have idealized, humanized, and celebrated the naked and nude human form over the centuries. Taking advantage of local museum collections, we will consider the tradition of the flawless classical god and goddess, how modern artists like Manet, Degas, Matisse and Picasso transgressed it, and, finally, how contemporary artists continue to radically transform the nude today. No experience with art history is necessary.
